AIRCZ Type:: Heathrow Planning Consultation Zone: All buildings, structures, erections and works exceeding 90 metres in height (295.3 feet)Contact: The Safeguarding Department, Heathrow Airport Limited, c/o Planning Services, First Point, Buckingham Gate, Gatwick Airport, West Sussex, RH6 0NT

description: Non Material Amendment to planning permission 22/01687/CREG3 (Erection of standalone modular building comprising of 4no. classrooms, 2no. WCs, Reception, Common Room, and associated circulation, removal and replacement of existing timber pedestrian gate and external steps with new metal framed gate and new metal external steps, new access control intercom and external light, landscaping works and erection of 1.8m separating fence) to allow amendment to overall footprint of the building, change in floor level, increase in eaves height, new entrance ramp and steps. Amendment to landscaping and areas of permeable paving added to comply with Condition no. 11 of App No.22/01687/CREG3.
